head.title: Homepage
head.description: A boiler plate Nuxt 3, Pinia, Vitest and Storybook

index.intro: For all things animal in Africa, catering to the discerning traveler and the inquisitive local alike. Whether you're seeking tips on how to outrun a cheetah (spoiler alert: you can't), or curious about the latest gossip from the savannah (who knew meerkats were such chatterboxes?), you've come to the right place.
